definitions: restore an electric charge to (a battery or a battery-operated device) by connecting it to a device that draws power from another source of electricity

examples.text: he plugged his razor in to recharge it

shortDefinitions: restore electrical energy in battery or battery-operated device by connecting it to power supply

definitions: (of a battery or battery-operated device) be refilled with electrical power

examples.text: the drill takes about three hours to recharge

shortDefinitions: (of battery or battery-operated device) be refilled with electrical energy

definitions: refill (a container, lake, or aquifer) with water

examples.text: the rate at which the aquifer recharges naturally

definitions: (of a person) return to a normal state of mind or strength after a period of physical or mental exertion

examples.text: she needs a bit of time to recharge after giving so much of herself this morning

shortDefinitions: return to normal state of mind or strength after period of exertion

definitions: the replenishment of an aquifer by the absorption of water

examples.text: extensive areas of trees reduce recharge to the underlying aquifers

shortDefinitions: replenishment of aquifer by absorption of water
